title: Kereska's Favour
content:
Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Ailments, buff Characters, or interacting with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Information Kereska's Favour

Description: Imbue yourself with elemental energy sourced from the draconic goddess, Kereska. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: -

How to Acquire Kereska's Favour in Baldur's Gate 3

Kereska's Favour can be acquired by the following classes:

Keres
